definition: to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
the Resurrected Army (CCTV documentary series about the Terracotta army)

sentences.english: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 這耶穌，神已經叫他復活了，我們都爲這事作見證。

sentences.english: That, at the resurrection, our bodies shall be transformed into absolutely ethereal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 復活時，我們的身體將變爲絕對虛無縹渺的東西。

sentences.english: The hugest one is Christ Resurrection Cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 其中最大的是基督復活教堂。

sentences.english: Of these 15 people to smallpox to the Easter Island.
sentences.chinese: 這15人也把天花帶到了復活節島。

sentences.english: The programme is to be broadcast in four episodes, culminating on Easter Sunday with the Resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 該節目共有四集，復活節將上演最後一集基督的復活。

sentences.english: The programme is to be broadcast in four episodes, culminating on Easter Sunday with the Resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 該節目共有四集，復活節將上演最後一集基督的復活。

sentences.english: Christians celebrate the resurrection of Christ from the death.
sentences.chinese: 基督教徒們慶祝耶穌基督的復活。

sentences.english: Father and Son have power to raise people from the dead.
sentences.chinese: 父與子有使人死裏復活的大能。

sentences.english: Each Easter Eddie eats eighty Easter eggs.
sentences.chinese: 每個復活節艾迪都喫八十個復活蛋。

sentences.english: Each Easter Eddie eats eighty Easter eggs.
sentences.chinese: 每個復活節艾迪都喫八十個復活蛋。

sentences.english: A congregation in Vorkuta gathers to celebrate Easter at a midnight Mass.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾庫塔會衆在午夜彌撒上團聚，慶祝復活節。

sentences.english: The memorial service didn't bring my husband back to life, but it took the edge off my sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 追悼會沒有讓我丈夫死而復活，但給了我很大的安慰。

sentences.english: The Christians use it as a symbol of the resurrection, out of the stone's tomb.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒則用來象徵“耶穌復活，走出石墓”。

sentences.english: Jesus makes them renascent then, turn them into wanted look.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌於是讓他們復活，變成他們想要的樣子。

sentences.english: Oh, I'm all tied up repenting for myself because it's the Easter Week.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我忙着懺悔呢因爲現在是復活周啊。

sentences.english: On busy Resurrection Sunday, Jesus took time out to find Peter.
sentences.chinese: 在復活的那個忙碌的星期天，耶穌還記掛着彼得。
